verses.name: Jeremiah 6:12
verses.text: And their houses shall be turned unto others, with their fields and wives together: for I will stretch out my hand upon the inhabitants of the land, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:13
verses.text: For from the least of them even unto the greatest of them every one is given to covetousness; and from the prophet even unto the priest every one dealeth falsely.

verses.name: Jeremiah 6:14
verses.text: They have healed also the hurt of the daughter of my people slightly, saying, Peace, peace; when there is no peace.
